title: A Modern Egyptian family
creator_credit: Sam Bryan and International Film Foundation
brief_description: Focuses on the life of a middle class family in Egypt. It shows the warmth and hospitality of the family and its strong feeling for Islam, and it depicts the effects of modernisation on traditional family patterns.
